remarks: Equivalence of continuity in the parent topology and continuity in a subspace.  (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 10-Jul-2009.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 21-Aug-2015.)
statement: cnrest2 $p |- ( ( K e. ( TopOn ` Y ) /\ ran F C_ B /\ B C_ Y ) -> ( F e. ( J Cn K ) <-> F e. ( J Cn ( K |`t B ) ) ) ) $.
